author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign Raider Build Showcase - How I Play Raider
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, we're going to be giving you guys further tips on how to play Raider, and I'm going to do a run-through of the game as well. And kind of explain to you my decision-making process along the way, so that you can understand why I've made the decision about Raider in an attempt to show you how you might make better decisions about the gear that you pick up when playing Raider.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki
